ValidationRule.description: Due Date should be consistent with Payment Terms selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( TEXT(Payment_Terms__c) = "Net 15", Due_Date__c != Invoice_Date__c + 15 ), AND( TEXT(Payment_Terms__c) = "Net 30", Due_Date__c != Invoice_Date__c + 30 ), AND( TEXT(Payment_Terms__c) = "Net 45", Due_Date__c != Invoice_Date__c + 45 ), AND( TEXT(Payment_Terms__c) = "Due on Receipt", Due_Date__c != Invoice_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Due Date must be consistent with selected Payment Terms. Use "Calculate Due Date" button or adjust manually.
